channel.title: Who is Syipkpker?
channel.description: Well, Everyone keeps saying he will hack servers. I need a full discription of what exactly he does. And this is server development/help. I need [b]HELP[/b] so don't lock this.

item.title: Who is Syipkpker?
item.dc:creator: @akl akl
item.description:
@akl wrote:

[quote=“casey., post:14, topic:220791”]One of the reasons God Of Ikilki was banned was because he was advertising a server crasher(which contained the files hosting Syipkpker). It worked but had several keyloggers in it, and once the staff found out he was immediately ip banned from the site.

This is why we do not encourage people to use his site, because we know he is going to pull a stunt like this again, if he hasn’t already. A while back he posted a irc client download which led to a fake page he made(impersonating xchat and mirc) and attached several trojans into that as well.[/quote]
He is and will be a trusted and valued member in my sights. You guys just banned him cause Niall hated him. Continue with your fake allegations. I still believe you are wrong.

Read full topic

item.title: Who is Syipkpker?
item.dc:creator: @gothic_queen casey.
item.description:
@gothic_queen wrote:

One of the reasons God Of Ikilki was banned was because he was advertising a server crasher(which contained the files hosting Syipkpker). It worked but had several keyloggers in it, and once the staff found out he was immediately ip banned from the site.

This is why we do not encourage people to use his site, because we know he is going to pull a stunt like this again, if he hasn’t already. A while back he posted a irc client download which led to a fake page he made(impersonating xchat and mirc) and attached several trojans into that as well.

Read full topic

item.title: Who is Syipkpker?
item.dc:creator: @pk3r_john pk3r john
item.description:
@pk3r_john wrote:

Basically, Syipkpker is a program that crashes other peoples servers. there is a way to fix it, and one of those is called peerguardian.
You just have to block his ip, and he never comes back :).
If you catch him in the act, write down his ip and look for that tutorial… it should be on rune-server.
Also, turn your server off if u catch him.

Read full topic

item.title: Who is Syipkpker?
item.dc:creator: @akl akl
item.description:
@akl wrote:

SYI is a program, created to show that ‘nulls’ are one of the worst things for a server.
The amount of ‘nulls’ it creates depend, but, if the load increases your server crashes = your server turns off.
There are many ways, also explained above my post.

Read full topic

item.title: Who is Syipkpker?
item.dc:creator: @meiscooldude meiscooldude
item.description:
@meiscooldude wrote:

[quote=“SonGoku, post:5, topic:220791”]Syipkpker is a program that kiddies use to crash your winterLove servers. It can do multiple things:

Create non client connections resulting in “nulls” on your playerlist, this will eventually crash your server.

Creates fake players that acually log in, crashes the server also.

Bomber, that wont help at all lol. The only sure way is to stop non client connections, or possibly make a diffrent login packet?[/quote]

making a different login packet… that would work, but then someone could just decompile the client, and find the new login packet…

Read full topic

item.title: Who is Syipkpker?
item.dc:creator: @SonGoku SonGoku
item.description:
@SonGoku wrote:

Syipkpker is a program that kiddies use to crash your winterLove servers. It can do multiple things:

Create non client connections resulting in “nulls” on your playerlist, this will eventually crash your server.

Creates fake players that acually log in, crashes the server also.

Bomber, that wont help at all lol. The only sure way is to stop non client connections, or possibly make a diffrent login packet?

Read full topic
